about.subtitle_about: I am a Front-End Developer with one year of experience as a freelancer. Additionally, I am a programming content creator on Instagram & YouTube under the username 'Dedi Indrawan'.
about.description_about: Someone who is proactive, easily adapts to changing situations, and possesses good communication skills. Understands the individual's role in achieving common goals and is accustomed to conducting thorough evaluation and analysis. Enjoys challenges that can enhance my abilities and experiences in achieving personal as well as company goals.

services.description_services: Translating graphic designs into programming code to build a responsive and aesthetic website layout.
Creating a consistent positive impression on users, fostering brand recognition, and building long-term relationships with the audience.
Creating visually appealing and consistent designs. Focusing on how these elements look and interact with the user.
Crafting a positive and satisfying user experience. Emphasizing how the product functions as a whole and how users feel comfortable using it.
Code that is structured, efficient, effective, and has a solid foundation, easy to manage, and ready to evolve over time.
Identifying appropriate solutions and creating a positive experience for users and the team involved in the project.

resume.description_resume: Constructing the structure, layout, and functionality of websites using programming languages like HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Additionally, planning, creating, and generating various types of content such as text, images, videos.
Providing transportation services to hotel guests specifically, and to other visitors in general. Also, coordinating with drivers regarding the type of journey and the destination of the guests.

Responsible for organizing and overseeing all operational and work activities of the branch store that I manage and lead. Also, designing marketing strategies and analyzing the development of customer purchasing power.

Professionals in the field of automotive paint color production, assigned to various affiliated company repair workshops on a mobile basis. Also providing consultation services regarding issues related to color and paint quality.

Working in the automotive paint color manufacturing section oriented towards achieving the best results in color matching. Also, coordinating with the paint division regarding any color-related issues that arise.

Vocational high school students learn about how automotive machinery construction can function effectively. They also create simple tools like hammers and study how the electrical systems in vehicles can operate.

content.subtitle_content: create feature show password with javaScript
content.description_content: In this video, I share a tutorial on how to create a show password feature that allows displaying a user's password input for viewing and adjustment.

content.subtitle_content: create elipsis with line clamp cSS property
content.description_content: In this video, I share a tutorial while also conducting a case study on how the 'line clamp' property in CSS works, so that it can provide an elipsis effect.

content.subtitle_content: create a button click event using javaScript
content.description_content: In this video, I share a tutorial on how we create a click event using several methods in JavaScript and direct it to navigate to a specific page.
